item.title: Http
item.description: Status: #idea Tags: [[tech]] HTTP Http stands for (Hypertext transfer [[protocol]]) which is the language for the [[web]] How HTTP works Request response model You have to request information to the [[server]] in order to get a response TIME « Data It takes more to response but you want to make sure that the page is complete It uses [[TCP]] protocol for the transmission and stability Simple HTTP request/ response You can create a server with you preferred programming language You can send a request from different clients such as: curl NetCat 1 2 3 4 GET / HTTP 1.
